tiles.name: center
tiles.prompt: MASK CENTER: Fill entire tile with solid white (#FFFFFF). Background fully transparent. No anti-aliasing or feathering; hard pixels only.

tiles.name: edge_north
tiles.prompt: MASK EDGE NORTH: White occupies lower 55–65% of tile; top is transparent. Boundary is monotonic left-to-right with small 1–4 px steps. Pure white only; background transparent; no AA.

tiles.name: edge_east
tiles.prompt: MASK EDGE EAST: White occupies left 55–65%; right side transparent. Vertical boundary with 1–4 px steps. No AA.

tiles.name: edge_south
tiles.prompt: MASK EDGE SOUTH: White occupies upper 55–65%; bottom transparent. Horizontal boundary with 1–4 px steps. No AA.

tiles.name: edge_west
tiles.prompt: MASK EDGE WEST: White occupies right 55–65%; left transparent. Vertical boundary with 1–4 px steps. No AA.

tiles.name: corner_NE
tiles.prompt: MASK OUTER CORNER NE: White is a convex quarter shape in NE quadrant (~45% radius). North and east outside area transparent. No AA.

tiles.name: corner_SE
tiles.prompt: MASK OUTER CORNER SE: Convex quarter in SE; east and south outside transparent. No AA.

tiles.name: corner_SW
tiles.prompt: MASK OUTER CORNER SW: Convex quarter in SW; south and west outside transparent. No AA.

tiles.name: corner_NW
tiles.prompt: MASK OUTER CORNER NW: Convex quarter in NW; north and west outside transparent. No AA.

tiles.name: tee_NEW
tiles.prompt: MASK TEE NEW: White forms a horizontal bar across the top (W↔E), bottom is transparent. South boundary is exposed; north/east/west continue. Keep hard steps; no AA.

tiles.name: tee_ESW
tiles.prompt: MASK TEE ESW: White forms a horizontal bar across the bottom (W↔E), top transparent. Hard pixel boundary; no AA.

tiles.name: tee_NSW
tiles.prompt: MASK TEE NSW: White forms a vertical bar near west side; east side transparent. Hard steps; no AA.

tiles.name: tee_NES
tiles.prompt: MASK TEE NES: White forms a vertical bar near east side; west transparent. Hard steps; no AA.

tiles.name: endcap_N
tiles.prompt: MASK ENDCAP N: Only north edge is a short exposed boundary; white covers most area except a thin transparent band along north. Hard edge.

tiles.name: endcap_E
tiles.prompt: MASK ENDCAP E: Only east edge exposed; thin transparent band on east; rest white. Hard edge.

tiles.name: endcap_S
tiles.prompt: MASK ENDCAP S: Only south edge exposed; thin transparent band on south; rest white. Hard edge.

tiles.name: endcap_W
tiles.prompt: MASK ENDCAP W: Only west edge exposed; thin transparent band on west; rest white. Hard edge.

tiles.name: inner_NE
tiles.prompt: MASK INNER NE: White fills tile except a concave transparent bite in the NE quadrant (~25–35% radius). No AA.

tiles.name: inner_SE
tiles.prompt: MASK INNER SE: White fills tile except a concave transparent bite in SE (~25–35% radius). No AA.

tiles.name: inner_SW
tiles.prompt: MASK INNER SW: White fills tile except a concave transparent bite in SW (~25–35% radius). No AA.

tiles.name: inner_NW
tiles.prompt: MASK INNER NW: White fills tile except a concave transparent bite in NW (~25–35% radius). No AA.

tiles.name: bridge_N
tiles.prompt: MASK BRIDGE N: Like edge north (top transparent, bottom white) but include a thin 2–3 px diagonal bridge near the NE and NW corners to imply diagonal adjacency. No AA.

tiles.name: bridge_E
tiles.prompt: MASK BRIDGE E: Like edge east (right transparent, left white) with a thin diagonal bridge near NE and SE corners. No AA.

tiles.name: bridge_S
tiles.prompt: MASK BRIDGE S: Like edge south (bottom transparent, top white) with thin diagonal bridge near SE and SW. No AA.

tiles.name: bridge_W
tiles.prompt: MASK BRIDGE W: Like edge west (left transparent, right white) with thin diagonal bridge near NW and SW. No AA.

tiles.name: thin_vertical
tiles.prompt: MASK THIN VERTICAL: Centered vertical white strip (~20–28% width) spanning full height; rest transparent. Hard edges; no AA.

tiles.name: thin_horizontal
tiles.prompt: MASK THIN HORIZONTAL: Centered horizontal white strip (~20–28% height) spanning full width; rest transparent. Hard edges; no AA.

tiles.name: thin_cross
tiles.prompt: MASK THIN CROSS: Plus-shaped white strip (vertical + horizontal, each ~20–28%); corners transparent. Hard edges; no AA.

tiles.name: thin_corner_NE
tiles.prompt: MASK THIN CORNER NE: L-shaped white strip turning from north to east (~20–28% width). Outer area transparent. Hard edges; no AA.

tiles.name: thin_corner_SE
tiles.prompt: MASK THIN CORNER SE: L-shaped white strip turning from south to east. Outer area transparent. Hard edges; no AA.

tiles.name: thin_corner_SW
tiles.prompt: MASK THIN CORNER SW: L-shaped white strip turning from south to west. Outer area transparent. Hard edges; no AA.

tiles.name: thin_corner_NW
tiles.prompt: MASK THIN CORNER NW: L-shaped white strip turning from north to west. Outer area transparent. Hard edges; no AA.

tiles.name: island_single
tiles.prompt: MASK ISLAND SINGLE: Single compact white blob (~28–36% area) centered; background transparent. Hard edges; no AA.

tiles.name: island_double_vertical
tiles.prompt: MASK ISLAND DOUBLE VERT: Two small white blobs stacked vertically, each ~18–24% area, ~12–16% gap; background transparent. Hard edges.

tiles.name: island_double_horizontal
tiles.prompt: MASK ISLAND DOUBLE HORIZ: Two small white blobs side-by-side, each ~18–24% area, ~12–16% gap; background transparent. Hard edges.

tiles.name: island_L_NE
tiles.prompt: MASK ISLAND L NE: Two small white blobs forming an elbow clustered toward NE, opening to SW; background transparent. Hard edges.

tiles.name: island_L_SE
tiles.prompt: MASK ISLAND L SE: Two small white blobs forming an elbow near SE, opening to NW. Hard edges; transparent background.

tiles.name: island_L_SW
tiles.prompt: MASK ISLAND L SW: Two small white blobs forming an elbow near SW, opening to NE. Hard edges; transparent background.

tiles.name: island_L_NW
tiles.prompt: MASK ISLAND L NW: Two small white blobs forming an elbow near NW, opening to SE. Hard edges; transparent background.

tiles.name: three_quarter_NE_open
tiles.prompt: MASK 3/4 NE OPEN: Large white mass (~70–78% area) with a concave transparent cut at the NE corner only. Hard boundary; no AA.

tiles.name: three_quarter_SE_open
tiles.prompt: MASK 3/4 SE OPEN: Large white mass with a concave transparent cut at SE only. Hard boundary.

tiles.name: three_quarter_SW_open
tiles.prompt: MASK 3/4 SW OPEN: Large white mass with a concave transparent cut at SW only. Hard boundary.

tiles.name: three_quarter_NW_open
tiles.prompt: MASK 3/4 NW OPEN: Large white mass with a concave transparent cut at NW only. Hard boundary.

tiles.name: stair_NE
tiles.prompt: MASK STAIR NE: White region forms a stepped diagonal up-right (3–4 px steps); north and east outside transparent. Hard steps; no AA.

tiles.name: stair_SE
tiles.prompt: MASK STAIR SE: White region forms a stepped diagonal down-right; east and south outside transparent. Hard steps; no AA.

tiles.name: stair_SW
tiles.prompt: MASK STAIR SW: White region forms a stepped diagonal down-left; south and west outside transparent. Hard steps; no AA.

tiles.name: stair_NW
tiles.prompt: MASK STAIR NW: White region forms a stepped diagonal up-left; north and west outside transparent. Hard steps; no AA.
